title: Maritime Area Planning Act 2021 (No. 50 of 2021), after consultation with the
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Maritime Area Consent (Non-
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Maritime Area Consent (Non-

Material Amendment) Regulations 2024. 

Definition
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited maritime area consent (non- material amendment) regulation 2024 definition

title: Maritime Area Planning Act 2021 (No. 50 of 2021), after consultation with the
heading: In these Regulations “condition” means a condition attached to a MAC
text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations “condition” means a condition attached to a MAC 
which requires the holder of the MAC to comply with an obligation as set out 
in the condition within a specified period of time. 

Classes of non-material amendments to MAC
text_norm: 2 regulation condition mean condition attached mac requires holder mac comply obligation set condition within specified period time class non-material amendment mac

title: Maritime Area Planning Act 2021 (No. 50 of 2021), after consultation with the
heading: 3. The following classes of amendments to a MAC are specified, for the
text_raw:
3. The following classes of amendments to a MAC are specified, for the 
purpose of section 86 of the Maritime Area Planning Act 2021 (No. 50 of 
2021), as non-material amendments: 

(a) 

the granting of not more than two extensions of time, for a 
period of not more than 6 months in respect of each such 
extension, for compliance by a holder of a MAC with a 
condition where the MARA, at its sole discretion, considers 
there are reasonable grounds for the granting of the extension of 
time; 

(b) 

an amendment to a MAC to correct a clerical error. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

16 April, 2024. 

DARRAGH O’BRIEN, 

Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 19th April, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [155] 3

title: Maritime Area Planning Act 2021 (No. 50 of 2021), after consultation with the
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations provide for classes of amendments to a Maritime Area 
Consent (MAC) issued by the Maritime Area Regulatory Authority (MARA) 
that are non-material amendments. 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [155]
